name: mcp-server-aws-kb-retrieval
description: MCP server for AWS Knowledge Base retrieval using Bedrock Agent Runtime

rating.reason: Tool name clearly indicates AWS Knowledge Base retrieval functionality. Description adequately explains what the tool does and its main parameters. Parameter descriptions are clear and specify their purpose. However, the description lacks detail about when to use it, what type of results it returns, or any limitations/constraints of the AWS KB service.
